articles.author: Daniel Kohn
articles.title: Red Sox vs. Yankees prediction, odds, time: 2025 MLB picks, best bets for AL Wild Card Game 3 by top model - CBS Sports
articles.description: SportsLine's model simulated Boston vs. New York 10,000 times and revealed its MLB picks for Thursday's American League Wild Card Game 3 matchup at Yankee Stadium in New York
articles.content: A trip to the American League Division series is on the line when the Boston Red Sox meet the New York Yankees in Game 3 of their Wild Card Series on Thursday. Boston won the opener 3-1, before New Y… [+4233 chars]
